text: Perry Firestone King (born April 30, 1948) is an American actor. He was born in Alliance, Ohio. King played the role of Cody Allen on the detective series Riptide from 1984 to 1986.Perry King Official website biography ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Ohio
title: Perry King
